title: Ep164 DIY Murders
description: This week, the gals tap into their creative sides with some stories straight out of a lifestyle magazine. Topics include a five-gallon tub of mystery, the contextual difference between machetes and firearms, and a regular State Fair-style showcase of human-based crafts. Crack open a bottle of Winc's WKND Sparkling White, stock up on Mod Podge, and tune in for DIY Murders. For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
